title: Sending a Multimedia Message
answer:
1.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45325) and ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45326) Text a message.  


 2.         Input the recipient. 

 3.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45327) and add a theme. The message is automatically converted to a multimedia message. 

 4.         Touch to add a picture, audio, or video attachment. The message is automatically converted to a multimedia message when a multimedia file is added. 

 5.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45328).
